function getDirectDeposit(address _nftContract, uint256 _tokenId) external view returns (address)
function fetchMarketItems() external view returns (tuple(uint256 itemId, address nftContract, uint256 tokenId, address seller, address owner, uint256 price, bool sold)[] memory)
function fetchItemsCreated(address _seller) external view returns (tuple(uint256 itemId, address nftContract, uint256 tokenId, address seller, address owner, uint256 price, bool sold)[] memory)
function fetchMyNFTs(address _owner) external view returns (tuple(uint256 itemId, address nftContract, uint256 tokenId, address seller, address owner, uint256 price, bool sold)[] memory)
function onERC721Received(address, address, uint256, bytes) external returns (bytes4)
